languages.text: {n}Идира насторожено прислушивается и резко поворачивается к Паскалю.{/n} "Слышу шепотки ехидные друзей своих из-за дверки. Будь аккуратнее в поисках, магос. Нельзя слишком долго глядеть в разбитое зеркало, так и себя ненароком можно увидеть — во всех осколках разом. А уж латать его тогда тем более дело скверное — новое отражение смерти подобно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира насторожено прислушивается и резко поворачивается к Паскалю.{/n} "Шепотки друзей своих из-за дверки слышу ехидные. Будь аккуратнее в поисках, магос. Нельзя слишком долго в зеркало разбитое глядеть, так и себя ненароком можно увидеть в одном из осколков. А уж латать его тем более дело скверное — новое отражение смерти подобно".

languages.text: {n}Idira tenses up and listens, then turns around sharply to face Pasqal.{/n} "I can hear my friends' snide whispers through the door. Be careful on your search, Magos. If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a tainted affair then — the new reflection is deathlike."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира насторожено прислушивается и резко поворачивается к Паскалю.{/n} "Слышу шепотки ехидные друзей своих из-за дверки. Будь аккуратнее в поисках, магос. Нельзя слишком долго глядеть в разбитое зеркало, так и себя ненароком можно увидеть — во всех осколках разом. А уж латать его тогда тем более дело скверное — новое отражение смерти подобно".

If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a nasty affair then: the new reflection's deathlike."

If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a nasty affair then: the new reflection's deathlike."

If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a bitter affair then — the new reflection is deathlike."

If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a tainted affair then — the new reflection is deathlike."

{n}Idira tenses up and listens, then turns around sharply to face Pasqal.{/n} "I can hear my friends' snide whispers through the door. Be careful on your search, Magos. If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a tainted affair then — the new reflection is deathlike."

languages.text: {n}Idira erstarrt, lauscht und wirbelt dann zu Pasqal herum.{/n} "Ich kann das bissige Geflüster meiner Freunde durch die Tür nicht hören. Seid vorsichtig bei Eurer Suche, Magos. Wenn man zu lange in einen zersplitterten Spiegel blickt, sieht man sich vielleicht selbst darin — in jedem Splitter gleichzeitig. Ihn zu reparieren, wird dadurch viel bitterer — das neue Spiegelbild gleicht dem Tod."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tenses up and listens, then turns around sharply to face Pasqal.{/n} "I can hear my friends' snide whispers through the door. Be careful on your search, Magos. If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a tainted affair then — the new reflection is deathlike."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira erstarrt, lauscht und wirbelt dann zu Pasqal herum.{/n} "Ich kann das bissige Geflüster meiner Freunde durch die Tür nicht hören. Seid vorsichtig bei Eurer Suche, Magos. Wenn man zu lange in einen zersplitterten Spiegel blickt, sieht man sich vielleicht selbst darin — in jedem Splitter gleichzeitig. Ihn zu reparieren, wird dadurch viel bitterer — das neue Spiegelbild gleicht dem Tod."

languages.text: {n}Idira écoute, crispée, puis se tourne brusquement vers Pasqal.{/n} « J'entends les chuchotements narquois de mes amis à travers la porte. Soyez prudent dans vos recherches, magos. Si vous fixez un miroir brisé trop longtemps, vous risquez de voir votre reflet dans chaque éclat à la fois. Le réparer est alors une affaire d'autant plus abjecte, car le nouveau reflet est semblable à la mort. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tenses up and listens, then turns around sharply to face Pasqal.{/n} "I can hear my friends' snide whispers through the door. Be careful on your search, Magos. If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a tainted affair then — the new reflection is deathlike."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira écoute, crispée, puis se tourne brusquement vers Pasqal.{/n} « J'entends les chuchotements narquois de mes amis à travers la porte. Soyez prudent dans vos recherches, magos. Si vous fixez un miroir brisé trop longtemps, vous risquez de voir votre reflet dans chaque éclat à la fois. Le réparer est alors une affaire d'autant plus amère, car le nouveau reflet est semblable à la mort. »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉突然绷紧了身体，仿佛在听着什么，然后猛地转向帕斯卡。{/n}“我的朋友们在门后窃窃私语。调查的过程务必当心，贤者。如果盯着碎镜子太久，你可能会在每块碎片中都看见你自己的影子。而修补它更是件难事，因为每片新的倒影看起来都死气沉沉。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tenses up and listens, then turns around sharply to face Pasqal.{/n} "I can hear my friends' snide whispers through the door. Be careful on your search, Magos. If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a tainted affair then — the new reflection is deathlike."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉突然绷紧了身体，仿佛在听着什么，然后猛地转向帕斯卡。{/n}“我的朋友们在门后窃窃私语。调查的过程务必当心，贤者。如果盯着碎镜子太久，你可能会在每块碎片中都看见你自己的影子。而修补它更是一件难事，因为每片新的倒影看起来都死气沉沉。”

languages.text: {n}イディラは緊張しながら話を聞き、そしてバッと振り返りパスカルと向き合った。{/n}「扉越しに友達の刺々しい囁きが聞こえるわ。探索中は気をつけて、マゴス。割れた鏡をずっと見つめすぎると、鏡の中に自分の姿が映るかも…全ての破片に一度によ。それを直すことは、辛い仕事だわ…新たに鏡に映った姿は死に近いの」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tenses up and listens, then turns around sharply to face Pasqal.{/n} "I can hear my friends' snide whispers through the door. Be careful on your search, Magos. If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a tainted affair then — the new reflection is deathlike."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは緊張しながら話を聞き、そしてバッと振り返りパスカルと向き合った。{/n}「扉越しに友達の刺々しい囁きが聞こえるわ。探索中は気をつけて、マゴス。割れた鏡をずっと見つめすぎると、鏡の中に自分の姿が映るかも…全ての破片に一度によ。それを直すことは、辛い仕事だわ…新たに鏡に映った姿は死に近いの」

languages.text: {n}Idira se tensa y escucha, luego se gira bruscamente para mirar a Pasqal.{/n} «Puedo oír los susurros sarcásticos de mis amigos a través de la puerta. Tenga cuidado en su búsqueda, Magos. Si se mira en un espejo roto durante mucho tiempo, puede que se vea en él... en cada fragmento a la vez. Arreglarlo es un asunto mucho más complicado: el nuevo reflejo es como la muerte».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tenses up and listens, then turns around sharply to face Pasqal.{/n} "I can hear my friends' snide whispers through the door. Be careful on your search, Magos. If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a tainted affair then — the new reflection is deathlike."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se tensa y escucha, luego se gira bruscamente para mirar a Pasqal.{/n} «Puedo oír los susurros sarcásticos de mis amigos a través de la puerta. Tenga cuidado en su búsqueda, Magos. Si se mira en un espejo roto durante mucho tiempo, puede que se vea en él... en cada fragmento a la vez. Arreglarlo es un asunto mucho más amargo: el nuevo reflejo es como la muerte».

languages.text: {n}İdira gerginlikle dinliyor, ardından da hızla Pasqal'a dönüyor.{/n} "Kapının ardından, dostlarımın iğneleyici fısıltılarını duyabiliyorum. Ararken dikkatli ol Magos. Kırık bir aynaya fazla uzun bakarsan her kırık parçada kendini görebilirsin. Hem de aynı anda... İşte o zaman tamiri çok daha pis bir hâl alır. Yeni yansıma, ölümü andırır."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tenses up and listens, then turns around sharply to face Pasqal.{/n} "I can hear my friends' snide whispers through the door. Be careful on your search, Magos. If you stare into a shattered mirror for too long, you might see yourself in it — in every shard at once. Mending it is that much more of a tainted affair then — the new reflection is deathlike."

Kırık bir aynaya fazla uzun bakarsan her kırık parçada kendini görebilirsin. Hem de aynı anda... İşte o zaman tamiri çok daha pis bir hâl alır. Yeni yansıma, ölümü andırır."
